tool_description: Adds customizable text overlays to images with font styling, positioning, and effects for social media content creation.

base_image_url.description: URL or path to the base image for text overlay

text_content.description: Text to overlay on the image

font_family.description: Font name: arial, helvetica, times, georgia, impact, comic-sans

position.description: Text position: top-left, top-center, top-right, center, bottom-left, bottom-center, bottom-right

text_effect.description: Text effect: none, shadow, outline, glow

max_width.description: Maximum text width in pixels for wrapping

error_messages: Base image not accessible: Ensure base_image_url points to a valid image file.
Empty text content: Provide non-empty text_content to overlay.
Invalid font family: Use one of [arial, helvetica, times, georgia, impact, comic-sans].
Font size out of range: Use font_size between 12 and 200 pixels.
Invalid text color: Provide a valid hex color code starting with #.
Invalid position: Use one of [top-left, top-center, top-right, center, bottom-left, bottom-center, bottom-right].
Background opacity out of range: Use value between 0.0 and 1.0.
Invalid text effect: Use one of [none, shadow, outline, glow].
usage: Provide base_image_url and text_content, then customize font properties, positioning, and effects. The tool returns an image with the text overlay applied.

output_image_url.description: URL or path to the image with text overlay applied

text_bounds.description: Bounding box coordinates of the text overlay

applied_settings.description: Summary of the text styling settings that were applied
